title: All America roses
brief_description: Shows how rose growers throughout the United States compete for the label “All-America-Rose” selection. Shows the checking of blooms at test stations where the best roses are brought to perfection; close-up studies of different varieties of roses; the use of roses in landscape gardening and interior decoration. Narrated by Peter Allen.
